title: [Question] How is the network in the hostel? (is there any Wi-Fi or is personal Wi-Fi allowed in the hostel?)

comments.body:
its dogshit every site is blocked cant even use spotify unless u got an real vpn you cant bypass that  
mobile hotspot works but depending on your hostel block and floor it may or maynot work
Which sites are blocked ? Give some examples
Anything flagged entertainment is usually blocked by pesu wifi

Nah youtube,reddit,twitter,insta these are allowed 
Use cloudwarp vpn to access all sites 
I used that only

You can use ur personal hotspot(the internet might be slow depending on ur room) or just use a vpn to bypass.
Cloudfare warp used to work for me till last year but it stopped working now, rn I'm using urban vpn and it works fine.
What can you do with hostel wifi then ? ðŸ˜­

Without vpn only the basic social media, and some of the pirated sites are also unblocked i think. With vpn, you can use anything so without vpn it would be hard. But yeah vpn sometimes reduces the speed a lot so it becomes hard when th3 speed is low. But if you have 5g it shd be fine ryt, it mostly works everywhere
Can you like use steam, epic games store or is it too much to ask ?
With the vpn you can browse the store,  but playing fps games is hard. You can prolly play story games
